data.message: Guys, Be BRAVE and take a bigger lead on plastic pollution. Strategically it's a no-brainer!

replies.message: Hi Andrew, thanks for getting in touch. We recognise that sustainability is an important issue and it’s one that we care about deeply as a company. Since 2012, all of our bottles and cans in Great Britain have been and are 100% recyclable. This means that all our drinks packaging can be recycled at home or when you’re out and about.  We’re  currently in the process of reviewing our sustainable packaging strategy which we will publish in the summer. Deposit return schemes are also a big part of these discussions as more people are looking for ways to increase recycling rates. For more info please visit: www.coca-cola.co.uk/sustainability-section
Coca-Cola could you not consider an alternative to plastic bottles?
Coca-Cola Same old same old boring response 2012 blah blah blah - do something instead of posting the same old rubbish
